title: Frigid Deceit
description: A mysterious death in the middle of a heavy winter storm has Rochester, New York Homicide Detectives Robert Hicks and Louis Baker looking for a witness, a beautiful young blond woman. The investigation follows a trail of deceit through a rundown office building, a small Canadian town and a popular strip joint. All the while someone, a hacker in control of the ever present computer systems, seems to be two steps ahead of the detectives' every move.Tracy Dixon is a young blond buxom co-ed, taking an all-male computer science class in order to raise her grades. She's smitten with her Calculus student until she finds out that he's not what he appears to be. She falls into a toxic relationship. She tries desperately to hang on to her life, spiralling out of control...
author: Cori Lynn Arnold
